description: Supports hex curse skills, turning them into auras that will apply their effect to all enemies in an area around you.

mods.text: + to Level of Supported Curse Skill Gems

mods: (80–88)% increased Area of Effect of Supported Curse Skills
Supported Skills apply their Curse as an AurasSupported Curse Skills also count as Aura SkillsUsing Supported Skills is Instant

mtx.description: Removes the visual effects on the player from arctic armour, tempest shield, blood rage, molten shell, phase run, any aura, any blasphemied curse, or any herald gem.
mtx.name: Invisible Buff Effect
